eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: Mother and child resolve their differences in Enis's family shop. Eyjafjalla realizes the answer to 'North Wind' is a folk song. As Eyjafjalla and Keller grow closer, Kahn tells Eyjafjalla of his suspicions.

attributes.content: So this is the Rhodes Island Siesta branch office?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: How did you know—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I happen to have a few friends at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You're a tour guide, aren't you? Don't tell me you're giving tours of a pharmaceutical company now.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I, I was driving a guest...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Save me the excuses.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It's dangerous for an Oripathy patient to hide his identity, regardless of reason. It's against the law, even in Siesta.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Yes, I know!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: But what am I supposed to...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Then you work so many jobs—and swindled me—because of Oripathy?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: ...and family.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What happens to me doesn't matter, but I worry about what happens to them when I'm gone.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I just need time... until the shop moves and we have a new future...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that. I'm not asking for your sympathy.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: No, I just remembered how much you charged me the other day compared to the average taxi price here.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Well, you lied about being a normal tourist...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Oh? You've got a sharper tongue than one would think.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What do you want?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Let's make a deal.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You saw that chap from MountainDash Logistics the other day, in the bar. He's my competitor.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: We're competing for the rebuilding rights in the commercial district, but he has home-ground advantage. I need some local help to even the odds.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You work for me, and I never saw you today. How's that?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You're trying to blackmail—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Now, now, there's no need for such language. You scratch my back, I scratch yours. And don't worry, you'll be paid.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I don't need a handout...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: And I'm not giving any handouts. All I want is a fair deal.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What's your deal?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I run a clean business here. We don't do forced relocations and the like. If everybody wins, so much the better.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Now, there's always going to be controversy when it comes to rebuilding. But I promise that I'll do better than MountainDash Logistics.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: We've already worked together once, after all. May I count on your vote?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I just want my family's bar to be relocated smoothly...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Deal, then.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, and one little word of advice.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: No matter what you have to deal with, Oripathy treatment is not something that can be delayed. You should make up your mind soon.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Aren't you concerned about dealing with an Infected?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I have a friend who's Infected too.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It is almost closing time at the museum. There are no tourists, but the audio tours continue to play on loop. The massive mountain boulder remains silent in the empty gallery.

attributes.text: 'The Naumanns left behind thousands of photos and samples...'
'The rebuilding of the villages around Mount Unna...'
'They visited more than a hundred volcanos across numerous countries...'

attributes.content: Did you really see it?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Yes! I saw the ice cream come in here!
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: You just wanted to come to the museum.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: I knew we wouldn't find it. He was lying to us. He didn't go to all those places...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: How did you get in? Admission is closed.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Sorry... we'll be going.
attributes.name: Frightened Boy

attributes.content: Have you seen my dad?
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: Your dad?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: We're looking for a... er... er... adventurer?
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: He went to a lot of places! In the photos he sent us, there were volcanoes, snow mountains, hills in nomadic cities...
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: His photo might be in the Volcano Museum!
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: What's your father's name?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Chuck!
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: I've never heard of a volcanologist by that name. Maybe you should ask elsewhere.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: I may know your dad.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: What are you doing here, Adele? And you look awful...
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: You've seen him?
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: You said your dad was an adventurer?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Where has he been?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I don't know... he always sends back photos when he visits a place.
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: I think the last one was from Sargon.
attributes.name: Innocent Girl

attributes.content: Sargon! I knew it.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: My parents were volcanic researchers. They told me a story about when they were surveying in Sargon...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: They quickly lost their way in the thick branches and leaves of the rainforest, and it felt like they were wandering around the stomach of a great beast.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Just as they thought they would never get out, they saw a man with leaves all over him.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: 'Are you lost? Do you need any help?'
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: He pointed the way for them and took them out of the rainforest. They even saw a sight of sunny rain. My parents were really thankful.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: 'Thank you so much for helping us out of there! What is your name, sir?'
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The man brushed off the leaves, took a photo of the rainforest, and said, 'No need to thank me. The name's Chuck. I'm taking this photo to send to my kids.'
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: And that's how the photo made it to you.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Really? Sounds made-up...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Of course it's true!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I think I have a photo here somewhere...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele digs through the papers and takes out a photo of the Naumanns smiling at the camera, with a few blurred figures behind them.
Look, here's your dad.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: (I'm still not sure that's actually my dad...)
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: (I can't see him clearly, but...)
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: (I hope he's my dad! That means he helped other adventurers find their way and sent us a photo! What a cool dad!)
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: (I didn't know you were a storyteller.)
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: (Just repeating something I heard from mom when I was little, with a few adjustments here and there.)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: (There's no reason for a professional volcanic survey team to accept help from an amateur. The story sounds entirely unscientific.)
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: (Science exists to bring hope to people, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Well, we can't have them running around the museum like this. If their parent or guardian isn't here, I'll take them home.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: You look tired, Adele. You should get some rest too.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Come, kids, I'll take you home.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Kahn, I think I should do it.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: But you...
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: It's fine. Let me do it.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: They look lonely... I'll keep them company.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Enis!
attributes.name: Excited Boy

attributes.content: Enis!
attributes.name: Excited Girl

attributes.content: Where did you go?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I found out where dad went!
attributes.name: Joyful Girl

attributes.content: Make sure you tell your family the next time you go out.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's you...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Huh? You're...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I'm the one who ran into you today and knocked you out... I'm Enis. I'm their brother. Are you okay? Any dizziness? Dr. Ceylon said... er, she said...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I'm sorry! I didn't mean to run off, but I had to go to work. I'll pay your medical expenses—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Dr. Ceylon told me everything. It's not your fault.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Your little brother and sister must be hungry. You should go home.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Thank you so much... what's your name?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Call me Adele.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I'll remember... little ones, don't you have something to say to Adele?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Thank you, Adele!
attributes.name: Girl & Boy

attributes.content: The mischievous boy reaches around the little girl's neck and pats her opposite shoulder.
Huh? Who's there?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: The girl looks hesitantly at the troublemaker next to her, who pretends nothing has happened, but could not hold back his laughter.
They chase each other into the shop, into the open arms of their mother, then run back out like frolicking beastling, while their mother tends to dinner being cooked on the stovetop.
Adele breaks out in a smile.
That's so nice to see.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Mr. Enis, do you know one Mr. Pelipper?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The Volcano Museum needs obsidian for its research. I heard you may be able to acquire some...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Damn, he just can't keep his mouth shut, can he...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Could I buy some from you?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: You helped me so much, I should repay the favor.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I dug these up around the volcano three months ago. They don't look great, but maybe they'll be useful for your research.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Thank you very much!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: However, I must ask you to stay away from the volcano. If you know anyone else who is mining for obsidian, please also tell them to stop doing so.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Mount Siesta has entered its active period. Even if it hasn't erupted yet, Originium activity in the area continues to increase.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: There is a risk of Oripathy infection without professional protective equipment.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Well, I...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: There is laughter coming in from outside, as the two children chase each other on the streets, as their shadows stretch in the setting sun.
Enis gazes at his siblings as they go further and further away, and subconsciously touches the spot on his chest where he was scratched by Originium.
Alright, I promise I won't go anymore.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: And thank you for playing with my siblings. That should have been my responsibility as big brother.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's okay. They're very cute. I had a good time too.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: By the way, your siblings said that your father has not been home for a long time?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: He's a, er, adventurer? Traveler? Explorer?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's not like he's gone off the grid or anything. He sends postcards and money back on a regular basis.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: You can be present without actually being there. However...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: By the time we get a letter from him, he's already off to the next place. All we know is that there's someone out there, going from one corner of the land to the other.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Sometimes I want to see for myself where he's been.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Harley raised us here while running the shop. But she says that life is a journey, and everyone chooses the sights they want to see.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: If you don't mind me asking... why are the three of you all different races?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Well, we're not blood-related...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: All three of us were adopted.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No need to look at me like that. It's not exactly taboo.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: People come and go every year, some seeking a new life, some seeking romance.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Many leave in disappointment when they find that life here isn't all it's cracked up to be, leaving behind children like us.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I can tell your siblings love you.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It must seem strange to outsiders, but for me, family is family. Ties of blood aren't that important.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I don't know what my birth parents looked like. Maybe they abandoned me, or maybe they loved me, and got into an accident.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: My new parents didn't hide anything from me. The little ones will be told the truth too, once they're a little older.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Adele looks at Harley, working in the shop, and Enis's siblings, who are already shadows in the distance. Everything is warm and peaceful, like a dream.
The obsidian feels heavy. She turns sideways and wipes away a teardrop from the corner of her eye.
And how long were you planning to hide it from me, Enis?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: —Mom?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Alright, I admit, I have thought of remaking this place into a hot springs resort...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I promise I won't try to do it behind your back! I won't do anything without your permission—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Once you've gotten everything in order, once arrangements for our future have been made the way you wanted.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Then you'll leave your mother and siblings behind the way you clear a drunkard out of the bar, and find a place to wait for Oripathy to take you?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Is that the journey you've chosen for yourself?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: ...You knew?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I was waiting for you to tell me.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Mr. Enis, you're already—
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Well, blame me and my fat fingers... I got scratched by Originium when I was digging for obsidian at the volcano.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I thought I was good at climbing...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Yeah, I learned my lesson...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: No, the only thing you learned to is to hide things from me, and you're not half as good as you think you are at it.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: You've got that look on your face that says 'I'm gonna finish everything, go far away, and tell my blissfully ignorant mother everything in a farewell letter after I die.' You think it's cool.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Now you've got that look on your face that says 'I can't even say that's not what's going on'.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: I-I didn't think it was cool. I just felt like it's what I have to do as a big brother... as a part of this family.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: After all, w-we're not...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Even if you didn't do anything, you'll still be their brother, and my son. There is no bargaining in love.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: If you insist on bargaining with me about this, young man, let me tell you that you'll be working off your debt for a long time.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, I thought some background music was in order for a scene like this.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Name's Byrd. Traveling troubadour.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Our resident singer now.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: You can afford a resident singer?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: No, but this one only wants to be paid a story.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Your Kazimierz story was wonderful. It helped a great deal in understanding the folk tunes of those parts.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Can I borrow your guitar?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Let me play a song.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: The evening mist covers the town ♪
The rising new moon makes it look like a new place ♪
My favorite place exists only in my sweet memories ♪
I have nothing but my sweet memories ♪
So you came here.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: How far can you see from here?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: It's all dark... just empty seas.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Not being able to see means you can imagine!
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: There's actually an island on the far side of the sea, and everyone who leaves Siesta lives on the island.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I'm a little scared... when we grow up, will our parents and Enis leave us...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: He won't!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Enis says we're an adventure team!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: A team doesn't leave each other. We'll go back to Old Siesta, and many other places...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: You can't tell there's something on Enis's mind?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: What? How do you have something on a mind?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: You're an idiot.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: The girl stands up, gazes at the direction of the volcano, and yells with all her strength.
Hey—Old Siesta—
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I miss you—
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Will you stop being angry?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: It's a loss for the Obsidian Festival that your performance was not part of it.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: There's nothing to be lost. Siesta has heard my music many times. I don't need to compete for attention with young people at a music festival.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: You're a Siestan with rock n' roll spirit.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: In my case, I added the Siestan identity to a rock n' roll spirit.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Chuck and I met on our travels in Siesta.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: We heard about the wondrous sight of the 'White Volcano,' how the entire volcano turns white like a marshmallow under certain weather conditions.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: We spent a year in Siesta without seeing a sight of it, but we fell in love with the city and settled down here, opening a little shop.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: If we couldn't find the 'White Volcano,' we could make one ourselves.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: So that's how the shop got its name? I thought you two just came up with it on the fly.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Dr. Keller has talked about the legend of the White Volcano before... but does it really exist?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Might be snow if it's just the top of the mountain, but when you're talking about the whole mountain... I don't know of any phenomenon like that.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Whether it actually exists or not is not important. The scene of legends has taken root in new soil, even creating a new legend of its own—
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: What a beautiful story.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: This reminds me of an old song that was written in Siesta.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: May I?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: It's a long, long journey ♪
I write on a ship with a broken mast ♪
My home is a hundred miles behind me ♪
How charming is the summer sun ♪
The North Wind blows a hundred miles, visiting the first volcano ♪
We'll meet again, along the forgotten trail ♪
Oh! I remember now! This is it!
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: 'The North Wind blows a hundred miles, visiting the first volcano ♪'!
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: That's the North Wind you're looking for?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Having a tune play itself over and over in your head but not being able to remember the lyrics is the seventh most painful thing in the world.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I'm feeling much better now! Thanks!
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Adele? Who are you talking to?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Er... myself!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Just thinking about the 'North Wind' in the lyrics.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: But Siesta is north of the ocean. It should be the south wind in the summer...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I'm reminded of a story about the songwriter. I think it was back in 1060?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: His album, 'Lost,' tells the story of how he got lost in the hills on a camping trip and had to be rescued.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: The album was a smash hit, and cemented how the singer 'couldn't find the north.'
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Maybe he got his directions mixed up.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Is that all there is to it?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The events of the past can often feel like a joke. We just seeing a snapshot preserved in time, but the actual truth is elusive.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: That's why the present is so precious, isn't it?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Ain't that right.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: What are you doing, Enis?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: P-Putting the sign up.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Ha! You stubborn boy.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: A hand...? Mom.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis stands on the ladder, lifting up the shop sign.
He takes the hammer and nail from his mother, and goes to work pinning it above the door.
The power switch is pulled, and neon-illuminated words begin to glow against the sun's last light.
White... Volcano?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The original Messenger for this batch called in sick. The letter was already like that when I got it. This was the only place I could think of when I saw 'volcano' on the envelope.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: I know as much as you do, if there's no information about the sender on the letter, there's no information.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: 'How have you been? I'm doing fine here.'
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: 'It's been a long time. I miss you.'
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: 'The volcano is a spectacular sight. The winds are strong at the peak.'
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: 'Love, Your Father'
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Mr. Enis... might this photo be from your father?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: My father?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: This is... Mount Unna! He really did go there!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Mom! Dad sent a photo! Want to see?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Write back to him and tell him that he loses his bet if he sends another postcard photo and not one that he actually took himself.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: After all, I raised my son to be cool, while all he does is steal other people's photos.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Real adventurers don't do that.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: I'll bring these obsidian samples back. We should have a more accurate estimate of the eruption time.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Glad to be of help.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: ...Adele, do you know why Keller called you to Siesta?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Some of the exhibits in the Volcano Museum were connected to my parents' research. Dr. Keller asked me to help organize things.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I'm not sure I understand your concerns...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: In their last days, my parents were studying the relationship between Originium veins and volcanic activity. There are many other people doing the same. Why would there be danger?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I wasn't sure it was my place to tell you what Dr. Naumann tried to hide from you... but hide this any longer, and you may never have the chance to learn the truth.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: In the year before Dr. Naumann died, her lab was frequently contacted by the personal army of a Leithanian Kurfürst.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Army...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The Naumanns were experts in Originium and ecology. Their research converged on the prediction and prevention of Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: But someone may have seen another possibility in their research.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Weaponization...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I was studying abroad at the time, so what I knew was limited to rumors in my classmates' messages.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: There was only one person who had access to their research.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Keller.
attributes.name: Kahn
